name: Directionalanalysislvmotion.GitHub.io
body:
### Files related to the project.

##  This PDF archive shows how the Horn and Schunck optical flow equations, extended to 4D, can be decoupled:
(https://DirectionalAnalysisLVMotion.github.io/pdfs/Decoupling4DOFequations.pdf)

##  This archive shows a parameter file for the XCAT phantom.

##  Generated mesh:
(https://DirectionalAnalysisLVMotion.github.io/pdfs/mesh_8cube.pdf)

##  Node expansion:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
